key.name: red-value
key.description: The battery level below which the battery is displayed as red. Also the value at which the low battery warning is displayed.

key.name: red-value-is-time
key.summary: Warn on low time rather than low percentage
key.description: Use the value defined in red_value as a time remaining to show the warning dialog rather than a percentage.

key.name: low-battery-notification
key.description: Notify user when the battery is low.

key.name: full-battery-notification
key.description: Notify user when the battery is full.

key.name: drain-from-top
key.description: Show the battery meter draining from the top of the battery. Only implemented for traditional battery view.

key.name: show-status
key.description: Show the upright, smaller battery on the panel.

key.name: show-battery
key.description: Show the traditional, horizontal battery on the panel.

key.name: show-text
key.description: 0 for no label, 1 for percentage and 2 for time remaining.
